title: ‘The Fabelmans’ Review: Spielberg’s Own Sentimental Education
description: The director’s latest movie focuses on a budding filmmaker a lot like himself. But Michelle Williams, as his mother, is the soul of this fractious family drama.
dc:creator: Manohla Dargis
media:credit: Merie Weismiller Wallace/Universal Pictures and Amblin Entertainment, via Associated Press
media:description: The actor Gabriel LaBelle plays an adolescent Sammy Fabelman, a stand-in for Steven Spielberg.
